Fees & PaymentsEverything you need to know

Tuition fees during your time at the Indian School of Hospitality:

Tuition fees cover the cost of your study at university; the fees include charges for things like your tuition, examinations and graduation. This page will guide you through fees for our academic programmes, any additional fees, as well as our various fee payment methods.

Registration fees

Upon acceptance to the Indian School of Hospitality, a registration fee (non-refundable) of Rs 50,000 is to be paid in order to confirm the student’s enrolment. This will be adjusted against the First Term fee payment of the first semester of the academic year.

Refundable deposit

Upon acceptance to the Indian School of Hospitality, a registration fee (non-refundable) of Rs 50,000 is to be paid in order to confirm the student’s enrolment. This will be adjusted against the First Term fee payment of the first semester of the academic year.

Certification fees

Upon acceptance to the Indian School of Hospitality, a registration fee (non-refundable) of Rs 50,000 is to be paid in order to confirm the student’s enrolment. This will be adjusted against the First Term fee payment of the first semester of the academic year.

Modes of payment

Payment options are Online/ NEFT/ Cheque/ DD paid to School of Hospitality India Pvt Ltd. The NEFT/ RTGS details are:

Account Name School of Hospitality India Pvt Ltd.
Bank Name HDFC
Account Number 1234561323234521
IFSC Code UTIB0242323232

Pay online easily and securely

Please visit our Online Payment Gateway for payment of tuition or other fees, to securely and seamlessly conduction transactions, keep records for your own history and keep track of outstanding payments.

Have a question?

For information regarding tuition fees for your chosen programme, or general queries regarding payments and processing, please use our Contact Us page.
